tool_description: Analyzes Y chromosome markers to determine paternal lineage connections and haplogroup classifications for male profiles.

profile_1_id.description: Identifier of the first DNA profile (must be male)

profile_2_id.description: Identifier of the second DNA profile (must be male)

marker_type.description: Type of Y markers to analyze: str, snp, both

genetic_distance_threshold.description: Maximum genetic distance for considering profiles related

error_messages: Profile not found: One or both profile IDs do not exist in the system.
Not male profile: Y chromosome analysis requires both profiles to be male.
No Y chromosome data: One or both profiles lack Y chromosome markers.
Invalid marker type: Use one of [str, snp, both].
Invalid distance threshold: genetic_distance_threshold must be between 0 and 20.
usage: Provide two male profile IDs and optionally specify marker type and distance threshold. Returns Y chromosome comparison results and paternal lineage information.

genetic_distance.description: Genetic distance between Y chromosome profiles

haplogroup_1.description: Y chromosome haplogroup for first profile

haplogroup_2.description: Y chromosome haplogroup for second profile

paternal_lineage_match.description: Whether profiles share recent paternal lineage

estimated_generations.description: Estimated generations to common paternal ancestor
